title: Insecurity
verses: Psalm 56:3-4 (WEB) — "When I am afraid, I will put my trust in you. In God, whose word I praise, in God I trust. I will not be afraid. What can flesh do to me?"
Proverbs 14:26 (WEB) — "In the fear of Yahweh is a secure fortress, and he will be a refuge for his children."
Psalm 112:7 (WEB) — "He will have no fear of evil news. His heart is steadfast, trusting in Yahweh."
Isaiah 26:3 (WEB) — "You will keep whoever’s mind is stayed on you in perfect peace, because he trusts in you."
Romans 8:31 (WEB) — "What then shall we say about these things? If God is for us, who can be against us?"
body: Security is not found by looking harder at yourself but by looking longer at God. As you rehearse His promises, your heart is anchored; fear loosens and courage grows.
prayer: Prince of Peace, steady my mind on You. Let Your perfect love drive out my fear and teach my heart to rest in Your unshakable care. Amen.
